publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4281 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC—That the Parliament congratulates Largs Thistle FC, its fans, players, committee and backroom staff on winning the Stagecoach West Region First Division title in style; commends the inspirational leadership of management team Sandy MacLean and Paddy McIlvogue, and wishes Largs Thistle all the best in next season’s Superleague Premier League, which The Theesel will grace for the first time. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Stewart Maxwell*, Aileen Campbell*, Sandra White*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-4281 Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) John Lamont*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4281 Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4281 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC—That the Parliament congratulates Largs Thistle FC, its fans, players, committee and backroom staff on winning the Stagecoach West Region First Division title in style; commends the inspirational leadership of management team Sandy MacLean and Paddy McIlvogue, and wishes Largs Thistle all the best in next season’s Superleague Premier League, which The Theesel will grace for the first time. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Stewart Maxwell, Aileen Campbell, Sandra White, Ross Finnie, John Lamont, Gil Paterson, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn
S3M-4281 Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-4281 Congratulations to Largs Thistle FC (lodged on 1 June 2009) Jamie McGrigor*
